name: Wigglytuff
author: Kagemaru Himeno
flavor_text: Its fine fur feels sublime to the touch. It can expand its body by inhaling air.

poke_power.name: Good Night Melody
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may use this power. Each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) is now Asleep. This power can’t be used if Wigglytuff is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Ballon Attack
attacks.effect: If Igglybuff is anywhere under Wigglytuff, this attack does 40 damage plus 20 more damage.
